mapper.select: SELECT lecture_archive_file_uuid lectureArchiveFileUUID, lecture_archive_file_original lectureArchiveFileOriginal, lecture_archive_file_size lectureArchiveFileSize, lecture_archive_file_count lectureArchiveFileCount, lecture_archive_file_createdate lectureArchiveFileCreateDate FROM lecture_archive_file WHERE lecture_archive_file_uuid = #{lectureArchiveFileUUID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture_archive_file ( lecture_archive_file_uuid, lecture_archive_file_original, lecture_archive_no, lecture_archive_file_size, lecture_archive_file_type, lecture_archive_file_createdate, lecture_archive_file_count ) VALUES ( #{lectureArchiveFileUUID}, #{lectureArchiveFileOriginal}, #{lectureArchiveNo}, #{lectureArchiveFileSize}, #{lectureArchiveFileType}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture_archive_file SET lecture_archive_file_count = lecture_archive_file_count + 1 WHERE lecture_archive_file_uuid = #{lectureArchiveFileUUID}
